description:
Very snappy experience. I like the way it handles code formatting. Very easy to start with Java. Very convenient for professionals. Easy to handle large and complex projects. Refactoring is a breeze. Native support for every framework out there. Convenient code generators for classes and testings.
I use every single Java IDE but I always come back to netbeans for my projects.

This app will not install Java on your host computer.

In case you are installing netbeans at a fresh computer then the app will not start. You need to install Java JDK first.

Any JDK version above 8 will be enough and then Apache NetBeans will work as expected.

IMHO this should be improved on the package to install *any* JDK as dependency for this package to function correctly. This would avoid frustration even for advanced users like myself to debug why it wasn't working.

To make it working (version15) you need to install OpenJDK. App doesn't open without it on ubuntu
sudo apt-get install openjdk-11-jre
Dose not work at all.

Install Java Development Kit.

sudo apt-get install openjdk-17-jdk
waste of time don't download
You don't even deserve that 1 star. Unfortunately, I can't give a review without any star. I wasted my time trying to install it.
does not work at all
this is bad . not open app

Works great, but does not work without java.
Netbeans requires Java 8 or later Java Develoment kit.
Run this command in the terminal to install Java Develoment kit.

sudo apt install openjdk-17-jdk
I think that it is the best IDE.
sudo apt install openjdk-8-jdk
I use this IDE for java, groovy and php development. The great thing about netbeans is that most stuff just works straight out of the box.
It just works. I always enjoyed the simplicity of this versus Eclipse and some other IDEs. Give it a shot.
Can't even use it because after showing the start screen, it crashes

sudo add-apt-repository ppa:linuxuprising/java
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt install oracle-java17-installer

Netbeans really went downhill after moving to Apache. I do HTML5/JS/PHP and often after starting it says it couldn't load a plugin module and had to disable it. Then I get no syntax highlighting or language support in JS. Then close and restart and it installs the Oracle JS plugin again. Then next start it gets disabled again. I'm going back to 8.2.
Perfect free alternative to PHPStorm.
To all the reviewers who claims that it is not working. Cannot start. I just would highlight that this software requires a pre-installed Java Development Kit on their system to make it work!

Llevo un par de meses usándolo y hasta ahora no he tenido inconvenientes. Ni con el rendimiento ni con el manejo de la aplicación en si. Llevaba años usando el netbeans en windows que al migrar a ubuntu creí que no iba a encontrar un ide igual de bueno que este, pero resulta que estaba equivocado.

Hola, una razon por la cual no abre el progrma despues de instalarlo es que no encuentra el JDK o Java, les recomiendo que lo instalen y ya abrira,
Los comandos son...
sudo apt update
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:webupd8team/java
sudo apt update
sudo apt install default-jre default-jdk

y listo despues de estos comandos ya pueden descargar netbeans y quedara al 100%
ni siquiera inicia despues de descargarla
Gracias por este trabajo!
